meanings.definition: The act or process of giving something a bronze color or finish.
meanings.sent1: The bronzings on the statue made it look ancient.
meanings.sent2: The bronzings of the medal shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The artist's attempt at bronzings turned the sculpture into a golden masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her touch brought a magical bronzings to the old vase.
meanings.sent5: The bronzings of the bell were so realistic, it seemed to come to life.

meanings.definition: The appearance or quality of being bronze.
meanings.sent1: The bronzings of her skin showed her love for the sun.
meanings.sent2: The bronzings of the statue gave it a regal look.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at a tan resulted in bronzings that made him resemble a statue.
meanings.sent4: The bronzings of the leaves in autumn painted a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent5: The bronzings of the old coin hinted at its long history.

meanings.definition: The application of bronze powder or paint to something.
meanings.sent1: The bronzings on the frame enhanced its elegance.
meanings.sent2: She carefully applied bronzings to the edges of the mirror.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected bronzings on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The bronzings on the car gave it a luxurious touch.
meanings.sent5: The bronzings on the jewelry added a touch of sophistication.

meanings.sent1: The bronzings on the door handle gave it a vintage look.
meanings.sent2: The bronzings of the statue were a testament to the artist's skill.
meanings.sent3: The accidental bronzings on the book cover made it unique.
meanings.sent4: The bronzings on the clock face added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent5: The bronzings on the sculpture highlighted its intricate details.
